00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_PARAMETER_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_PARAMETER_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/at.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/fold.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/placeholders.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/mpl/size.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/put/generic/result_of_modulo.hpp>
00020     
00021 namespace boost{
00022 namespace assign{
00023 namespace v2{
00024 namespace put_compose_aux{
00025 
00026         template<std::size_t N,typename Pars, typename T, 
00027         bool exit = (N == boost::mpl::size<Pars>::value)>
00028         struct result_of_forward_parameter
00029     {
00030         typedef typename boost::mpl::at_c<Pars, N>::type at_;
00031         typedef result_of_modulo::generic<T> meta_;
00032         typedef typename boost::mpl::apply1<
00033                 meta_,
00034             at_
00035         >::type new_t_;
00036         
00037         typedef result_of_forward_parameter<N+1, Pars, new_t_> next_;
00038         
00039         typedef typename next_::type type;
00040         
00041         template<typename H>
00042         static type call(H const& pars_holder, T const& t)
00043         {
00044                 typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> int_;
00045                 return next_::call(
00046                 pars_holder,
00047                 t % pars_holder.static_lookup( int_() )
00048             );
00049         }
00050         
00051     };
00052 
00053         template<std::size_t N,typename Pars, typename T>
00054         struct result_of_forward_parameter<N, Pars, T, true>
00055     {
00056 
00057                 typedef T type;
00058 
00059         template<typename H>
00060         static type call(H const& pars_holder, T const& t)
00061         {
00062                 return t;
00063         }
00064     
00065     };
00066 
00067         template<typename Pars, typename T,typename C>
00068     typename result_of_forward_parameter<0, Pars, T>::type
00069         forward_parameter(
00070         T const& object,
00071         C const& c
00072         )
00073     {
00074         typedef result_of_forward_parameter<0, Pars, T> caller_;
00075         return caller_::call( c.parameters(), object );
00076         }
00077 
00078 }// put_compose_aux
00079 namespace result_of{
00080 
00081         template<typename T,typename Pars>
00082     struct forward_parameter : put_compose_aux::result_of_forward_parameter<
00083                 0,
00084         Pars,
00085         T    
00086     >{};
00087     
00088 }// result_of
00089 }// v2
00090 }// assign
00091 }// boost
00092 
00093 #endif
